Song.title: Your Love
Song.copyright: Words & Music by Bob Kauflin © 2004 Sovereign Grace Praise

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [E | A | F#m | B | C#m | G#m | A | B]
Chorus: [E]Your love will [A]last forever [F#m]It’s like a [B7]mighty river [C#m]That flows and [E/G#]flows forever [A]Never [A/B]stop[B]ping [E]Your awesome [A]love protects me [F#m7]When I sin Your [B7]love corrects me [C#m]You’re faithful [E/G#]to direct me [A]Al[F#m7]ways [B]to Your [E | A | F#m | B]love
Verse 1: [A]And when I think of [E]all You’ve done [A]There’s no love greater than [E]this [A]You freely gave Your [C#m7]precious Son [D]To die for all my [B (to chorus)]sins
Verse 2: [A]And when I choose to [E]disobey [A]You lead me back to Your [E]truth [A]You show the fullness [C#m7]of Your love [D]By making me like [B (to chorus)]You
Arrangement.searchtext: intro chorus your love will last forever its like a mighty river that flows and flows forever never stopping your awesome love protects me when i sin your love corrects me youre faithful to direct me always to your love verse 1 and when i think of all youve done theres no love greater than this you freely gave your precious son to die for all my sins verse 2 and when i choose to disobey you lead me back to your truth you show the fullness of your love by making me like you
